mapper.insert: INSERT into article (article_id, user_id, article_time, article_like, article_content, article_img) values ((SELECT MAX(article_id)+1 from article), #{user_id}, sysdate, 0, #{article_content}, #{article_img})
mapper.select: select board_num, board_title from (select rownum r, board_num, board_title from (select * from board order by board_num desc)) where r < 11
